Bringing scalability, security, and privacy to a blockchain near you

  * STARKEX

##  Our Solutions

### Scale Your App with STARKs

Our scaling solutions use STARK-based validity proofs to ensure an Ethereum-
secure, fast and seamless user experience. They support a range of data
availability modes. Learn More

### Starknet

**A Permissionless Decentralized Validity-Rollup (often referred to as ZK-
Rollup).**  
Any developer can deploy any dApp, using smart contracts, and achieve
unlimited scale.  
  

Read more

### StarkEx

**A Standalone Validity-Rollup SaaS**  
dApps can build on the StarkEx service. StarkEx supports a range of use cases
out of the box: NFT minting & trading, derivative trading, AMM, spot trading,
payments, and DeFi Pooling.  

Read more

##  For Developers

### Cairo

Cairo is a language for creating STARK-provable programs for general
computation. Cairo powers Starknet and StarkEx, scaling applications on
Mainnet. Cairo 1.0 is the upgraded Rust-inspired version of Cairo.

Try Our Playground  Learn More

### StarkWare Labs

See what you can do with ethSTARK, Ziggy, and VeeDo.

##  Learn, Build, Scale

###

Talks, podcasts, posts, and news.

### L2 Peace II – L2s Online Session

Bringing together all the L2s to discuss the many ways to scale Ethereum, the
challenges and milestones ahead, and why we’re all gonna make it

### StarkWare’s Predictions for 2024

2024 is bound to be exciting, with enhanced performance, reduced transaction
costs, and reaching new heights for developers and users

### Starknet Launches the ‘Devonomics’ Pilot Program

The Starknet Foundation, in collaboration with StarkWare, is launching
Devonomics, an experimental pilot program that puts Starknet developers first
by rewarding and empowering them

Read more
